snippet: The cuts could take more than $1 million in federal production aid from PBS shows, which have been hard-pressed for financing in recent years.
abstract: National Endowment for the Arts proposes stripping more than $1 million in federal production aid from several PBS shows, many of which are already hard-pressed for financing.
lead_paragraph: The cuts could take more than $1 million in federal production aid from PBS shows, which have been hard-pressed for financing in recent years.

headline.seo: N.E.A. Is Said to Cut Aid to PBS Arts Shows
headline.main: N.E.A. Is Said to Cut Aid to Arts Programs on PBS
headline.print_headline: N.E.A. Is Said to Cut Aid To Arts Programs on PBS
